name: FrogLike (dukedie4)
description:
• "F" to interact with objects
  • "Left-Click" to attack
  • "ASWD" to move
  • "Tab" to switch weapons

Embark on a thrilling adventure as a greedy frog in a lush forest. Explore your surroundings, defeat enemies, and collect valuable treasures. The intuitive key bindings make it easy to navigate and engage in battle, while the shop trees and vending machine provide opportunities to upgrade your abilities and take on new challenges. With each death, the game resets, adding a classic rougelike aspect to your treasure-seeking journey. Get ready for a unique and challenging experience as you work to accumulate as much gold as possible.
